==Season== During the 1985 season, [[Jim Everett]] led the nation in total offense (3,589 yards), which was also a school record, since broken by [[Drew Brees]]. Everett finished sixth in balloting for the [[Heisman Trophy]]. <ref>http://www.goldfan.com/purdue_hncaa.shtml</ref>
